### setup_fresh_db

>  setup_fresh_db ()

*Create a fresh database with all initial data*

## Start with a fresh database

WARNING: This will erase all data in the database!

## Use an existing database on disk

``` python
db = init_db()
db.t.categories()
```

game_id=1
db.t.bindings.rows_where("game_id = ?", game_id)
